HediffDef.label: animal immunoenhancer
HediffDef.description: An installed analysis computer which inspects the bloodstream, classifies pathogens, and rapidly prompts the body's natural immune system to respond to them faster than it could alone. This speeds immunity gain significantly.

HediffDef.label: animal circadian supercharger
HediffDef.description: An installed combination assistant and half-cycler, disables the need to rest of the animal without affecting its consciousness. An animal using this implant will be susceptible to EMP weapons.

HediffDef.label: animal healclot synergizer
HediffDef.description: An installed combination coagulator and healing enhancer, combines advanced coagulation and accelerated healing technologies, providing rapid blood clotting and enhanced tissue repair.

HediffDef.label: animal dermal armor gland
HediffDef.description: An installed animal dermal armor gland implant. Releases chemical and nanomachines that transform the user's skin into a built-in suit of armor. The whole epidermis thickens and hardens to resist burns, while jointed exterior keratin plates form everywhere they can - including the head and face.

HediffDef.label: animal nuclear stomach
HediffDef.description: An installed animal nuclear stomach implant. A micro-nuclear reactor combined with complex chemical synthesis replaces the body's need for food energy. Food is required only to replace matter lost from the body, reducing the animal's intake needs significantly. However, there is little room to shield the reactor, so the radiation increases the risk of cancer.
